name: Hateboard 2145
description:
Forget about Mortal Kombat and Smash TV, the real future of gory 90s action games is here! Skate for your life in a dystopian cyber future as you face menacing mutants, killer cyborgs and bloodthirsty criminals! Can you survive to the end and become the undisputed champion of Hateboard? It’s time to SKATE AND DIE

Arrows move, Up jumps
X performs a trick in mid-air, which builds Power
Z Uses up power for a flaming burst attack.

Made in 72 hours for Toronto Game Jam 2021
